channel.title: Testscape help!
channel.description:
i downloaded a source of testscape i didnt the client.java thing and all the other intructions but when i try and compile it says javac is not recognised as an internal or external command,operable program-batch file.
and also people say right click on compile.bat and edit did you mean view-compile.bat but when i view it and it says edit i can erase anything this is wat it says. @echo off title TestScape Compiler javac *.java pause
so please help iv been trying to fix it for 3 days now lol. and another thing is when i try and run it a screen comes up and goes off. and i dont have that compiler that says press c to compile r to run and e to exit. mine is a normal 1 that u get with mostly evry source./ thanks.

item.title: Testscape help!

iv double clicked on it.
and it says run or cancel.
then i click run then it goes.
nothing else comes up.

Read full topic

item.title: Testscape help!
item.dc:creator: @Benz Benz
item.description:
@Benz wrote:

Have you double clicked on “perfectrun.bat”

It will automatically do all that.

item.title: Testscape help!
item.dc:creator: @kingjibs96 kingjibs96
item.description:
@kingjibs96 wrote:

i downloaded a source of testscape i didnt the client.java thing and all the other intructions but when i try and compile it says javac is not recognised as an internal or external command,operable program-batch file.

and also people say right click on compile.bat and edit did you mean view-compile.bat but when i view it and it says edit i can erase anything this is wat it says.
@echo off
title TestScape Compiler
javac *.java
pause

so please help iv been trying to fix it for 3 days now lol.
and another thing is when i try and run it a screen comes up and goes off.
and i dont have that compiler that says press c to compile r to run and e to exit.
mine is a normal 1 that u get with mostly evry source./
thanks.

Read full topic
